title: Peirs Gaueston Earle of Cornvvall His life, death, and fortune.
author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for N[icholas] L[ing] and Iohn Busby, and are to be sold at the west doore of Paules,
